lead_paragraph: Russian businessmen Alisher Usmanov and Vladimir Lisin should be members of the new commission created to combat doping, the commission's head Vitaly Smirnov said on Friday, the TASS news agency reported.

headline.print_headline: Russian Businessmen Usmanov, Lisin Should Join Anti-Doping Commission-TASS Cites Commission Head
headline.main: Russian Businessmen Usmanov, Lisin Should Join Anti-Doping Commission-TASS Cites Commission Head

snippet: Russian businessmen Alisher Usmanov and Vladimir Lisin should be members of the new commission created to combat doping, the commission's head Vitaly Smirnov said on Friday, the TASS news agency reported....
